About Us

Unique Catering is a reputed Catering business in Kathmandu Valley. Apart from Kathmandu Valley we conduct business outside the valley as required by our clients. We specialize in providing Full Catering and Half Catering Services. Also Rental Services are availabe as well.active We have skilled Chefs who have more than 20 years of experience in this field. Variety of dishes such as Nepali, Indian, Continental, Chinese, Thai, Italian dishes are available with exiquisite decorations. Remember us for any kind of party, picnic, events and gathering.
